items.title: Thailand’s Credit Outlook Cut to Negative
items.summary: Fitch shifted Thailand’s sovereign outlook to negative, flagging fiscal strain and governance risks that raise downgrade odds.

items.title: Typhoon Ragasa Disrupts Ports and Power Grids
items.summary: Super Typhoon Ragasa shuttered key ports and knocked out power systems, choking Asian trade lanes just as inventories were rebuilding.
